Self_Assessment_Questions: Do I have clear understanding of my core purpose and values? Am I living aligned with my natural dharma?
Measurement_Tools: Values assessment, purpose clarity survey, dharmic alignment score, life satisfaction index
Development_Resources: Meditation practice, spiritual texts, purpose workshops, values clarification exercises, dharmic counseling

Self_Assessment_Questions: Do I have effective systems for managing my time, goals, and resources? Can I organize and execute complex projects?
Measurement_Tools: Productivity metrics, project completion rates, system effectiveness scores, leadership assessments
Development_Resources: Productivity courses, project management training, leadership development, systems thinking workshops

Self_Assessment_Questions: Am I physically fit and mentally sharp? Do I continuously develop my technical and cognitive abilities?
Measurement_Tools: Fitness benchmarks, cognitive tests, skill certifications, learning velocity tracking
Development_Resources: Fitness programs, cognitive training, skill courses, mind-body practices, performance coaching

Self_Assessment_Questions: Do I have a strong, diverse network of relationships? Can I create mutual value and leverage connections effectively?
Measurement_Tools: Network analysis, relationship quality index, collaboration success rate, influence metrics
Development_Resources: Networking events, relationship building courses, collaboration workshops, influence training

Self_Assessment_Questions: Do I have a clear financial strategy and multiple income streams? Am I building sustainable wealth?
Measurement_Tools: Financial health scorecard, investment portfolio analysis, income diversity index, wealth accumulation rate
Development_Resources: Financial education, investment courses, business development, wealth building strategies

Self_Assessment_Questions: Do I serve others with genuine care and hospitality? Am I culturally aware and emotionally intelligent?
Measurement_Tools: Emotional intelligence assessment, service quality ratings, cultural competency evaluation, empathy index
Development_Resources: Emotional intelligence training, cultural immersion, service projects, hospitality development

Self_Assessment_Questions: Do I have a clear, authentic personal brand? Am I recognized for my expertise and unique value?
Measurement_Tools: Brand audit, online presence analysis, thought leadership metrics, reputation assessment
Development_Resources: Brand strategy courses, content creation training, thought leadership development, marketing education
